data.title: Marchel HOLLE
data.text:
Marchel Holle is the US Government Affairs Lead for ispace technologies U.S., where he supports stakeholder engagement and business development efforts. Prior to ispace, Marchel served as Manager of Washington DC Operations for the Space Foundation managing key relationships with Congress, international partners and federal agencies. He previously supported microgravity and earth observation policy at the Space Studies Board of the National Academies of Science, Engineering, and Medicine. Marchel received his B.A. in government with minors in physics and history from Hamilton College in 2016.
